sentence.Network_en: Peafowl fly well despite their size, and roost in trees at night.
sentence.Network_cn: 孔雀不管大小, 都善于飞行,晚上在树上栖息.

sentence.Network_en: The white peafowl is the albino aberrant form of the blue peafowl.
sentence.Network_cn: 白孔雀则是蓝孔雀的白化变种.

sentence.Network_en: Peafowl are precious birds that people love as a symbol of auspiciousness.
sentence.Network_cn: 孔雀作为吉祥之鸟深受人们喜爱,是举世驰名的珍禽.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 孔字的解释---在线新华字典 ... 孔桥〖 bridge〗 孔雀〖 peacock;peafowl〗 孔雀石〖 malachite〗.
